mods.note: 4 1 1 I 1 1 IN FLIGHT—One of the machines which took part in the flight. They were under the command of Flight Lieutenant Isaac. r r -t f

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘OVER MOUNT RAKAPOSHI: NOTABLE R.A.F. FLIGHT IN THE HIMALAYAS’

mods.abstract: Newspaper cuttings from The Times newspaper article, 28 December 1932, covering a Royal Air Force demonstration flight over the Himalayas in November 1932. This folio includes a print of an aerial photograph – taken during the course of the flight – showing a close up shot of a RAF Hawker Hart.The flight did not fly over Mount Rakaposhi as claimed by the article.
